alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 4:29PM EDT until September 30 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 PM EDT Friday was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 05/17/1989. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 5.5 7.0 Fri 4 pm EDT 4.2 2.9 2.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 600 AM EDT.
